about_the_game:
Rise for the Fight is an upcoming Cartoon Multiplayer FPS game being developed by Reece Makes Games.

Rise for the Fight's core gameplay is all about guns and damage. Deal damage to upgrade your gun's rate of fire and magazine capacity, but watch out because...


if you die, your gun stats reset...

Are you ready to fight?



Features:

- Expansive and Expressive Character Customization, with more coming in the future.
- Unique Twists to Classic Game Modes.
- 8 Simple yet Unique Maps, with more coming in the future.
- Over 10 Different Guns to play with.
- Singleplayer Mode (Requires Internet Connection to play)

Controls (KEYBOARD AND MOUSE):
- WASD = Move
- Left Shift + WASD = Sprint
- Left CTRL = Crouch
- Crouch + Sprint = Slide
- Left Click = Shoot
- Right Click = Aim
- R = Reload
- H = Heal
- E = Interact
- 1/2/3 = Upgrade Gun Stats

Notes:

- This game's servers are set to US East, so if you are in a different region, you may experience high ping.

- There may be several bugs in the game, as it's in early development.



If you come across any issues with the game, please submit feedback in the comments on what can be improved.



Have Fun!
-Reece

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 22H2 or newer
  • Processor: Core i5 650 or AMD Athlon II X3 450
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 or GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are most suited for 1080p 60fps. Requires an Internet Connection to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 22H2 / Windows 11 23H2 or newer
  • Processor: Core i5 6600k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3gb or R9 280 3gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are most suited for 1080p 144fps. Requires an Internet Connection to play.

short_description: A Cartoon Multiplayer FPS Game, where you can upgrade your guns by dealing damage or gaining multikills.
